PrivacyPolicyText.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyText.description: How we handle your data and photos.
PrivacyPolicyText.detailText:
## 1. Introduction

Welcome to Color Analysis Quiz ('we', 'our', or 'us'). We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclosure, and safeguard your information when you use our AI Seasonal Color Analysis application.

## 2. Information We Collect

We collect information that you provide directly to us:
- **Facial Images:** Photos you upload for color analysis.
- **Contact Information:** Your email address (if provided for report delivery).
- **Usage Data:** Information about how you interact with our service.

## 3. How We Use Your Information

### 3.1 Image Processing (Biometric Data)
We use your uploaded photos EXCLUSIVELY to:
- Analyze your skin tone, eye color, and hair color features.
- Generate visualization images (Virtual Draping) showing different colors on your photo.

**We do NOT use your photos to train public AI models or for any facial recognition surveillance purposes.**

### 3.2 Service Delivery
- To provide the seasonal color report.
- To send you your results via email.

## 4. Data Storage & Retention

- **Photos:** Uploaded images are stored securely in our cloud storage (Cloudflare R2) for the duration of your session to allow for analysis and report generation. We implement retention policies to periodically delete old session data.
- **Reports:** Your analysis results (text data) may be stored to allow you to access your report later.

## 5. Third-Party Services

We use trusted third-party providers to operate our service:
- **AI Processing:** Google Gemini (for image analysis and generation).
- **Hosting:** Vercel / AWS.
- **Storage:** Cloudflare R2.

## 6. Your Rights

You have the right to request the deletion of your data at any time by contacting our support team.

TermsOfServiceText.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServiceText.description: Rules for using Color Analysis Quiz.
TermsOfServiceText.detailText:
## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Color Analysis Quiz, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.

## 2. Description of Service

Color Analysis Quiz provides AI-powered personal color analysis and virtual draping services. Users upload a photo to receive a seasonal color report and visualization images.

## 3. User Responsibilities

You agree that:
- You own the rights to the photos you upload, or have explicit permission from the subject.
- You will not upload content that is illegal, offensive, pornographic, or violates the rights of others.
- You are at least 13 years of age.

## 4. AI Disclaimer

**The analysis and images provided are generated by Artificial Intelligence.** While we strive for accuracy, AI interpretations of color seasons are subjective and may not always be 100% accurate or align with a human consultant's opinion. The results are for entertainment and informational purposes only.

## 5. Refund Policy

Due to the digital nature of our product (immediate access to analysis and server/GPU costs incurred), purchases are generally non-refundable once the analysis has been performed. If you encounter a technical error, please contact support.

## 6. Intellectual Property

- **Your Content:** You retain ownership of your uploaded photos.
- **Our Content:** The website design, code, logos, and generated reports (excluding your likeness) are owned by Color Analysis Quiz.

## 7. Limitation of Liability

Color Analysis Quiz shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the service.

seoContent.title: Everything You Need to Know About Personal Color Analysis
seoContent.section1Title: What is a Color Analysis Quiz?
seoContent.section1Body: A color analysis quiz is a tool designed to identify your personal color seasonâ€”Spring, Summer, Autumn, or Winter. Based on the 12-season color theory, it analyzes the undertones of your skin (warm, cool, or neutral), the contrast of your features, and the intensity of your eye and hair color. While traditional analysis requires an in-person appointment with a stylist, our **AI Color Analysis Quiz** uses advanced computer vision to perform this assessment in seconds, offering a fast, free, and accurate alternative.
seoContent.section2Title: How to Do Your Own Color Analysis?
seoContent.section2Body: If you want to try a DIY approach before using our AI, here are the basics: 1. **Vein Test:** Look at the veins on your wrist. Green veins suggest a Warm undertone; blue/purple veins suggest Cool. 2. **Jewelry Test:** Does silver (Cool) or gold (Warm) make your skin glow? 3. **Contrast:** Do you have a high contrast between your hair and skin (like Snow White) or low contrast? Combining these factors helps pinpoint your season. However, human bias often leads to incorrect resultsâ€”which is why our objective **AI Color Analysis** is often more reliable.
seoContent.section3Body: Korean Personal Color Analysis has exploded in popularity thanks to K-pop idols and social media. It places a heavy emphasis on skin clarity and brightness. Our tool incorporates these modern K-beauty standards, helping you find colors that not only match your season but also enhance your natural complexion, giving you that 'glass skin' effect.
